column3: 🚽I need to go to the toilet.
column6: 🚽Can you help me go to the toilet?

column8: 🙋Can you help me take a bath?
column9: 🙅‍♂️I don't want to take a bath.

column7: 🔊Listen to what my application is saying!

column6: 🧑‍🤝‍🧑I want to play with my friends.
column7: ❌I don't want to play with you.
